name: Inverse (Elvendwarf)
description:
This is the little Puzzle-Platformer i've made for the Minijam#71!
Art inspired by Cave Story, Music made by
Pixel Beats, Enjoy! If you find any error please comment below ^^

Controls: 

WASD -> Move/ Push Boxes/ Enter Doors
J -> Jump
K (Hold) -> Use Gravity Gun
R-> Reset the level

Advice:
Be careful with the recoil!
The music changes everytime!

Hey, Having a hard day? What about some chilling chiptune vibes and some puzzles?
